posts.post_content:
Figured I would post this here in case anyone is going after the set or for fellow Black Sox collectors. 

In my opinion, Attell's most appealing card. Just a beauty. FR-PR and a pinhole at the top and bottom, but great eye appeal. $150 delivered and he's all yours. PM or email me at [url]eppersmatt@yahoo.com[/url]


[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=208737&d=1445458668[/IMG]

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=208738&d=1445458678[/IMG]
FYI, I think the boxers are T9, not T3.
